tags.name: zui-svg
tags.description: Standardizes external *.svg files across browsers, and also supports svg sprites if you supply a *.svg file with multiple `` definitions for each graphic, and then corresponding id=""* to show.

attributes.name: svg-id
attributes.description: Only applicable to svg sprites, supply an id for which `` to show i.e. id="#graphic-name"

attributes.name: viewBox
attributes.description: viewBox deteremines an *.svg file's canvas size; this value in most situations is automatically found and set but if your graphics aren't displaying or scaling correctly, copy and supply the viewBox="0 0 # #" from your `

properties.name: svgId
properties.description: Only applicable to svg sprites, supply an id for which `` to show i.e. id="#graphic-name"

properties.name: viewBox
properties.description: viewBox deteremines an *.svg file's canvas size; this value in most situations is automatically found and set but if your graphics aren't displaying or scaling correctly, copy and supply the viewBox="0 0 # #" from your `
